Posts.Title: Side Effects From Aromasin

Posts.Content: On 3/31/2008 2ndChance wrote: I do not have knots on my wrists but am noticing joint swelling (knots) on my index fingers.  I just found this site today and am so relieved to have found it.  I just started doing research to try to determine which of the meds I'm on were causing all of the terrible pain I am experiencing.  I never would have thought that one drug could be responsible for so much going on in my body.  I was orignally on Arimidex in Jan. 2006 for a year.  The joint and muscle pain was so severe that I changed to Aromasin.  I've been on  that ever since.  But I'm also on other meds for various conditions.  So it's hard to determine which of the meds is actually causing the problem or if you have something new going on.  I too had  a torn meniscus and knee surgery in Dec. 2006.  Then I stated developing carpal tunnel-like symptoms and trigger finger.  I had a cortisone shot in the base of the finger on my palm and that seemed to work for a few months.  Now it's back again.  I pretty much have constant painin my legs, arms, fingers and toes.  Burning sensations in my hands, throbbing pains and lots of cramping.  In January I started doing Jazzercise 3 times a week and go as much as I can with visits to the chiropractor in between.  I'm having Jin Shin treatments twice a month.  It's a constant battle so it's good to know that I am not alone.  Baby aspirin?  I've switched to the real thing and try to always have something in my stomach when I take it.  Pain pills, Xanax - whatever seems to be right for that day.  I know I'm having a bad day when I actually take a whole pill instead of half or quarters.  I'm so sick of having to rely on these things but also tired of being in constant pain.  So now it's Spring and yard work time and nothing is going to stop me from gardening.  Once day at a time.   Thanks for your reponse.The weather was nice sunday so i worked in the yard until noon and thought i was not going to walk. I stayed on the couch the rest of the day..Then this morning i  wake up in so much pain that i  am sadden by the thought of not being able to work in my yard.. The pain medication does help .. i now have the pain in my hip. oh well another day Cancer free.. Give me some more pain...Ha Ha.. LoL
